channel.title: Opds on Arrans github.io
channel.description: Recent content in Opds on Arrans github.io

item.title: koreader/koreader
item.description: An ebook reader application supporting PDF, DjVu, EPUB, FB2 and many more formats, running on Cervantes, Kindle, Kobo, PocketBook and Android devices

item.title: booklore-app/booklore
item.description: BookLore is a self-hosted app for managing and reading books & comics (PDF, EPUB, CBZ) with metadata editing, OPDS, reading progress, and multi-user support.

item.title: Kareadita/Kavita
item.description: Kavita is a fast, feature rich, cross platform reading server. Built with the goal of being a full solution for all your reading needs. Setup your own server and share your reading collection with your friends and family.
